name: QuaranDance Demo
description:
It's a simple rhythm game demo that I made because I was bored. I plan to reuse the code to make an RPG with rhythm mechanics. Press the arrow keys (or WASD) when the notes reach the indicator in the middle. If you preserve combos you'll score a bit higher.

The game is made for it to be really simple to add a new song, so I'll probably code a way to import XMLs (which is the format I'm currently using) with the note sheets and audio files to play whatever song you'd like.

If you want you can message me to discuss how it was made and if you want me to add a song you made we can talk about it too.

CREDITS:

MUSIC: https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure 

CHARACTER SPRITES: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/member/azuna-pixels/

TILESET SPRITES: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/member/nauris-amatnieks/

The rest of the sprites and code was done by me :)
